mapper.sql: select id, item_code, item_no, item_name, product_use_methods, item_short_name, item_specification, item_type, item_own, category_type, customer_item_code, m_item_type, s_item_type, colour_number, appearance, specifications, unit, wh_stock_unit, discount, brand, brand_own, price, tare_weight, gross_weight, net_weight, line_net_weight, identification_net_weight, filling_volume_upper, filling_volume_lower, filling_unit, image_url, density, image_url2, inner_image_url, inner_image_url2, description, net_content, percentage, bar_code, customer_id, property, supplier_id, manufacturer_id, note, warn_toplimit, warn_lowerlimit, content, storage_condition, place_origin, Introduction_conditions, Introduction_date, effective_Day, need_quality, need_barcode_stockout, need_weigh, need_confidential, vulgo, melting_point, particle_size, conventional_packing, submission_code, reach_no, origin, first_aid, bom_note, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, product_type, submission_code_sts, check_status from base_item
mapper.select: where status = 2
where id = #{id}
where item_code = #{itemCode}

select id, item_code, item_no, item_type, item_own, colour_number, case when need_confidential = '2' then '******' ELSE item_name END as item_name, specifications, unit, wh_stock_unit, discount, brand, brand_own, price, net_weight, bar_code, customer_id, property, supplier_id, manufacturer_id, content, origin, status, product_type, check_status from base_item where item_type = #{itemType} AND status = 2

select item_id, item_code, item_name, item_type, product_type, unit, wh_stock_unit, bar_code, item_no from v_item
#{item}
select item_id, item_code, item_name, item_type, product_type, unit, wh_stock_unit, bar_code, item_no from v_item where item_id = #{itemId}

select item_id from v_item
item_Name like concat('%', #{itemName}, '%')
select id, item_code, item_no, item_name, item_type, unit from base_item
where item_no = #{itemNo} and item_type = #{type}
where id = #{itemId}
where id = #{itemId}
mapper.insert:

item_code, item_no, item_name, product_use_methods, item_short_name, item_specification, item_type, item_own, category_type, customer_item_code, m_item_type, s_item_type, colour_number, appearance, specifications, unit, wh_stock_unit, discount, brand, brand_own, price, tare_weight, gross_weight, net_weight, line_net_weight, identification_net_weight, filling_volume_upper, filling_volume_lower, filling_unit, image_url, density, image_url2, inner_image_url, inner_image_url2, `description`, net_content, percentage, bar_code, customer_id, property, manufacturer_id, note, warn_toplimit, warn_lowerlimit, content, storage_condition, place_origin, Introduction_conditions, Introduction_date, effective_Day, need_quality, need_barcode_stockout, need_weigh, need_confidential, vulgo, melting_point, particle_size, conventional_packing, msds, coa, tds, attachment_url14, non_animal_test, allergen_info, ifra_file, other_file, company_standards, submission_code, reach_no, origin, first_aid, bom_note, status, create_by, create_time, product_type, check_status, submission_code_sts,

update base_item
status = 1
where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: where item_code = #{itemCode}

select t1.item_code, t1.item_no, t1.item_name, t2.content, t2.item_sort, t1.id from base_item as t1 Left JOIN base_bomdtl as t2 on t1.id = t2.item_id
t1.id in
#{itemId}
ORDER BY t2.item_sort
where colour_number = #{colourNumber}
select id, item_code, IF(need_confidential = 2, '******', item_name) as item_name, price,submission_code_sts from base_item # where item_type in (1, 3, 4)
